title: WTF?!?!?!?! NO RANKED???!?!?!?!
body: League doesn't give me the option to play ranked. Is this happening to anyone else?

replies.body: Ranked play was taken down as a way to protect people from losing ranked matches while the login servers were down. It looks like everything should be smoothed out, and you should be able to queue for Ranked again!
I love you riot!!!!! Can I have some rp?

Heeeeeey if you only need a little bump in RP to buy something, I hear there are some art enthusiast poros that you can contact in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) that might be able to help out!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Yep. Was there before my last game... now it's not. Thought I was banned or something. lol
Yep, hopefully it is fixed shortly.
